Definition/Description: name of cell or nuclei prep from an ROI_specimen_name, can generate multiple FACS_containers
container (strip or tube or plate) from a cell_prep_name containing dissociated cells
10x port or SmartSeq well from a cell prep container, generally leading to one library (not used in PatchSeq)
Load name for 10x, can lead to multiple libraries, needed especially for Multiome library unification
